questions.question: Translate the sentence: Je vais traîner avec mes copains.

choices.answer: We are going to buy trainers.
I am going to hang out with my friends.
I am going to buy trainers.
I am going shopping with my friends.

questions.question: Conjugate the verb Aller in the form of Nous.

choices.answer: Nous vais
Nous allons
Nous vont
Nous allez

questions.question: Translate the sentence: I am going to eat a beefburger.

choices.answer: Je vais manger un steak haché.
Je vas manger un beefburger.
Je mange un steak haché.
Je vais un beefburger mange.

questions.question: Translate the sentence: You are going to surf the net.

choices.answer: Je vais surfer sur Internet.
Tu vais surfer sur Internet.
Tu vas surfer sur Internet.
Tu vas surf sur Internet.

questions.question: When writing the near future in French, the verb must be...

choices.answer: Nominative
Imperative
Accusative
Infinitive

questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ils vont faire de la natation.

choices.answer: They are going to go swimming.
We are going to play chess.
I am going to play chess.
I am going to go swimming.

questions.question: What is wrong with the following sentence: Elles vont danse à la disco.

choices.answer: Incorrect word order
Incorrect infinitive
Incorrect conjugation
Incorrect spelling

questions.question: Translate the sentence: I am not going to go ice-skating.

choices.answer: Je ne vais pas faire du patin á glace.
Je ne pas vas faire du patin a glace.
Je ne vais pas faire du patin à glace.
Je vais jouer de la patin au glace.

questions.question: Translate this sentence: Next week I am going to swim in the sea!

choices.answer: Je vais en mer nager ensuite weekend!
La semaine prochaine je vais la mer natation!
La semaine prochaine je fais nager dans la mer!
Semaine prochaine je vais nager dans la mer!

questions.question: What are the correct conjugations of aller, in order?

choices.answer: Vais, vas, va, allons, allez
Vais, vas, va, allez, allons, vont
Vais, vas, va, allons, allez, vont
vais, va, ves, alles, aller, von
